title: Phaeogramma hispida
content:
Phaeogramma hispida is a species of tephritid or fruit flies in the genus Phaeogramma of the family Tephritidae.[2]

Hawaiian Islands.

This article related to members of the fly sub-family Tephritinae is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
